decks.notes: The main concept of this combo deck is to utilize various spells and creature abilities to quickly mill through the deck and fill the graveyard with key cards like Bridge from Below and Thassa's Oracle. By combining cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Simian Spirit Guide for mana acceleration, players can bring out powerful combo pieces like Undercity Informer and Balustrade Spy to mill through the deck, reanimate creatures like Narcomoeba, and ultimately win the game with Thassa's Oracle for a game-winning finish.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupting opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. Its mana acceleration from cards like Grim Monolith and Ancient Tomb allows for explosive plays while also utilizing land destruction with Wasteland and Ghost Quarter. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their game plan using a combination of lock pieces and powerful threats.

The main concept of this Doomsday combo deck is to use Doomsday to set up a winning situation by stacking the deck with cards like Thassa's Oracle and The One Ring, while using cards like Force of Will and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the game and protect the combo. Through careful planning and strategic use of resources like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual, the deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to win the game before the opponent has a chance to respond effectively.

The main idea of this deck is to combine the cards Painter's Servant and Grindstone to mill the opponent's entire deck in one turn. This combo is supported by cards like Voltaic Key, Basalt Monolith, and Urza's Workshop to generate mana quickly. The deck also includes other artifacts like Mox Opal and Grim Monolith to further accelerate the combo. Karn, the Great Creator is used as a versatile toolbox to find specific artifacts when needed. Overall, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game before the opponent can react.

This deck focuses on quickly generating mana and assembling the necessary combo pieces to cast a large number of spells in a single turn to win the game. Key cards include Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, Lion's Eye Diamond, and Echo of Eons to generate mana and draw cards, as well as Tendrils of Agony as the win condition. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy to protect the combo. The goal is to combo off and storm off with spells to deal lethal damage to the opponent in one turn.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using Cloudposts and other lands in order to cast big Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog. It also utilizes cards like Crop Rotation to search for specific lands, Once Upon a Time to find key pieces, and Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opposing decks. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and control the game with disruptive tools like Bojuka Bog and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale. The ultimate goal is to set up a winning board state while disrupting the opponent's strategy.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and disruptive cards like Stifle and Dress Down. The goal is to quickly deploy a powerful threat in Phyrexian Dreadnought and protect it while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes card draw and filtering to find the necessary pieces, along with a few additional win conditions like Curie, Emergent Intelligence and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game and dictate the pace of play.
